posts.post_title: SOLD: Cobb Red Portrait PB and Beaumont
posts.post_content:
Cobb Red Portrait with Polar Bear Back, SGC 1 - It ain't pretty, but it's a Cobb portrait with a number grade that isn't trimmed for under $1k.
SOLD delivered, net to me, with PayPal Friend payment preferred.

Ginger Beaumont, SGC 1.5
SOLD delivered, net to me, with PayPal Friends payment preferred.

Please PM or email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] with questions, for larger images, or to purchase.  Thanks!
